segments.text: Were you a leader when you were in college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I was Propaganda department minister of our university .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you get any honors or awards at your university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . It â€™ s a pity about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Were you involved in any club activities at your university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I was a member of the basketball Society . I like playing basketball .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What extracurricular activities did you usually take part in at your college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I sometimes played basketball and sometimes played football .
segments.speaker: S2
